typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Id as string,
		Title as string,
		Link as string,
		{Image Link} as string,
		Price as string,
		Availability as string,
		Description as string,
		Description_Long as string,
		Brand as string,
		Color as string,
		{Refinement Color} as string,
		Size as string,
		Dimension as string,
		Gender as string,
		Sale_Price as string,
		GTIN as string,
		MPN as string,
		Material as string,
		{Refinement Material} as string,
		{Lining Material} as string,
		{Insole Material} as string,
		{Outsole Material} as string,
		{Hardware Material} as string,
		{Item Group Id} as string,
		{Additional Image Links} as string,
		Breadcrumbs as string,
		isOutlet as string,
		MerchandiseDivision as string,
		MerchandiseClass as string,
		OnlineFrom as string,
		DefaultVariant as string,
		AdditionalCategories as string,
		Silhouette as string,
		IsOnClearanceShop as string,
		IsOnSale as string,
		StyleGroup as string,
		ProductType as string,
		ProductSetItems as string,
		Rating as string,
		ReviewCount as string,
		IsMemberExclusive as string,
		BagSize as string,
		IsEmployeeSale as string,
		IsNewArrival as string,
		VariationId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		id as string,
		inventory as string,
		full_price as string,
		sale_price as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 lookup(source1@Id == source2@id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Id as string,
		Title as string,
		Link as string,
		ImageLink as string,
		Price as string,
		Availability as string,
		Description as string,
		Description_Long as string,
		Brand as string,
		Color as string,
		{Refinement Color} as string,
		Size as string,
		Dimension as string,
		Gender as string,
		Sale_Price as string,
		GTIN as string,
		MPN as string,
		Material as string,
		{Refinement Material} as string,
		LiningMaterial as string,
		InsoleMaterial as string,
		OutsoleMaterial as string,
		HardwareMaterial as string,
		ItemGroupId as string,
		AdditionalImageLinks as string,
		Breadcrumbs as string,
		isOutlet as string,
		MerchandiseDivision as string,
		MerchandiseClass as string,
		OnlineFrom as string,
		DefaultVariant as string,
		AdditionalCategories as string,
		Silhouette as string,
		IsOnClearanceShop as string,
		IsOnSale as string,
		StyleGroup as string,
		ProductType as string,
		ProductSetItems as string,
		Rating as string,
		ReviewCount as string,
		IsMemberExclusive as string,
		BagSize as string,
		IsEmployeeSale as string,
		IsNewArrival as string,
		{VariationId } as string,
		ineventory as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Title,
		Link,
		Price,
		Availability,
		Description,
		Description_Long,
		Brand,
		Color,
		{Refinement Color},
		Size,
		Dimension,
		Gender,
		GTIN,
		MPN,
		Material,
		{Refinement Material},
		Breadcrumbs,
		isOutlet,
		MerchandiseDivision,
		MerchandiseClass,
		OnlineFrom,
		DefaultVariant,
		AdditionalCategories,
		Silhouette,
		IsOnClearanceShop,
		IsOnSale,
		StyleGroup,
		ProductType,
		ProductSetItems,
		Rating,
		ReviewCount,
		IsMemberExclusive,
		BagSize,
		IsEmployeeSale,
		IsNewArrival,
		{VariationId } = VariationId,
		Id = source1@Id,
		ineventory = inventory
	)) ~> sink1
